sentences.sContent: He spent two and a half weeks with us in June 1986.
sentences.sCn: 1986年6月，他和我们呆了两个半星期。

sentences.sContent: ...was the night of the England-Italy match on June 14...
...joining a programme that Bill and Melinda Gates and Warren Buffett started in June to encourage other wealthy people to give...
...as a Yemeni airliner did on its way to Comoros Islands in the India ocean June 30...

trans.tranOther: the sixth month of the year, between May and July
